name: opentok-web-samples
description: Sample applications for using the OpenTok.js library.

scripts.test: eslint . && npm run build-angular && npm run build-react && npm run build-vue
scripts.build-angular: cd Angular-Basic-Video-Chat && npm i && npx ng build
scripts.build-react: cd React-Basic-Video-Chat && npm i && npx npm run build
scripts.build-vue: cd Vue-Basic-Video-Chat && npm i && npx npm run build

author: Adam Ullman <adam@tokbox.com>
